title: Thelonious Monk - Monk's Music 1958 (w/ John Coltrane)
description:

It features amazing interactions from the assembled ensemble. Joining Monk (piano) are Ray Copeland (trumpet), Gigi Gryce (alto sax), Coleman Hawkins (tenor sax), John Coltrane (tenor sax), Wilbur Ware (bass), and Art Blakey (drums). 
Hearing Coltrane and Hawkins together is admittedly part of the charm in these sides. Monk's horns-rich arrangements, and the quality of the soloists to hand, has made Ã¢â‚¬Å“Monk's MusicÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ a well-loved and important part of Monk's canon.
